meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>solve</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to solve</vocabulary>. You know this verb is for when you are doing the solving because you think it's super <reading>coo</reading>' (く) to solve things.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as 解ける, so if you know that you can read this one too.
